fs
  • Reference

File manipulation

file_access file_exists dir_exists link_exists

Query for existence and access permissions

file_chmod

Change file permissions

file_chown

Change ownership or group of a file

file_copy

Copy a file

file_create dir_create link_create

Create a file, directory, or link.

file_delete

Delete a file

file_info

Query file metadata

file_move

Move/rename a file

Directory manipulation

dir_copy

Copy a directory

dir_delete

Delete files in a directory

dir_list dir_walk dir_info

List files in a directory

file_access file_exists dir_exists link_exists

Query for existence and access permissions

file_create dir_create link_create

Create a file, directory, or link.

path_norm

Return the canonicalized absolute pathname

Link manipulation

file_access file_exists dir_exists link_exists

Query for existence and access permissions

file_create dir_create link_create

Create a file, directory, or link.

link_path

Read the value of a symbolic link

Path manipulation

path

Construct path to a file or directory

path_expand

Perform tilde expansion of a pathname

path_home

Provide the path to the users home directory

path_norm

Return the canonicalized absolute pathname

path_split

Split a path into components

path_temp

Path to sessions temporary directory

Helpers

is_file is_dir is_link

Functions to test for file types

as_bytes

Coerce an object to a fs_bytes object

as_fs_perms fs_perms

File permissions
